content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal Extraction Point at position (y)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position y)

### Iron Plate Factory at position (z)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position x to the assembling machine at position z

### Iron Gear Wheel Factory at position (w)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position w)
- Inserter (position c) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position d) that connects the iron plate factory at position z to the assembling machine at position w

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough required resources in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron-plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when attempting to craft without a crafting machine or furnace
- Verify that you are using the correct crafting machine or furnace for the items you are trying to craft.
